code: import React from"react";import shannadLogo from"../assets/GPT.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MessageBubble=_ref=>{let{sender,text}=_ref;const isUser=sender==="user";const copyToClipboard=async()=>{try{await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);}catch(_){}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"message-row ".concat(isUser?"user":"bot"),children:[!isUser&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bot-avatar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:shannadLogo,alt:"Shankhnad",className:"bot-logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"message-bubble",children:[text,!isUser&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"copy-btn",onClick:copyToClipboard,"aria-label":"Copy message",children:"Copy"})]})]});};export default MessageBubble;
